mason_homePage.auth.spec.js
Mason HomePage Scenarios
MegaNav - Validate L1 categories are visible when User hovers on Departments
MegaNav - Validate an overlay when User hovers on Departments

MegaNav - Validate User is redirected to L2 when clicked on the hyperlink

Validate the New Address Modal in Make Payment page

Validate the ComboBox in the SavedAddress in Make Payment page

Validate the SavedCC details in the dropdown in Make Payment page

Validate the selected CC details in Make Payment page
Validate the Payment section in Make Payment page
Validate the Review Payment section in Make Payment page
Validate the Payment Success in Make Payment page
Validate the Edit Option from Review Payment in Make Payment page

mason_sb_homepage.spec.js
Mason Commerce Tool Site
GPH-Promotional Banner Managment - Verify the promotional banner should be displayed On Homepage
GPH-Stoneberry Logo Redirect - Verify the appearance and accesibility of the Stoneberry logo at the lefthand side
GPH-Sticky Header- Verify the header is sticky through the following pages: PDP
GPH-Mega Menu Navigation - Verify Mega Menu Navigation opens on hovering within the CTA
GPH-Search Bar - Verify the search field appearance, help text display, and functionality
GPH-Account Drawer - Verify generation of the account drawer upon clicking the Account icon
GPH-Cart Icon and Drawer - Verify display and functionality of the Cart icon and drawer
GPF-Newsletter Mailing List Widget - Verify the display of the newsletter widget, text, textbox, form field label, help text, and CTA functionality
GPF-Static Links - Verify Test the display and functionality of static links and associated URLs
GPF-Social Icons - Verify the display and functionality of social icons and their respective hyperlinks
GPF-Additional Site Logos - Verify the display and functionality of additional site logos and their redirection
GPF-Copyright and Legal Text Links - Verify the display and functionality of copyright and legal text links
HP-Category Image Tiles - Verify the display and functionality of category image tiles, including image, title, and hyperlinks
HP-Full Width Banner - Verify the display and functionality of full-width banners, including image/video content and redirection upon click
HP-Category Grid - Verify the display and functionality of the 6x3 category grid, including image/icon, title, and hyperlinks
HP-Top Brands Image Tiles - Verify the display and functionality of the top brands image tiles, including image, title, and hyperlinks
HP-Brand Logos - Verify the display and functionality of brand logos, including image, title, and hyperlinks
HP-Seasonal Savings Widget - Verify the display and functionality of the Seasonal Savings widget, including product image content cards, navigation arrows, and View All link
Account - Invalid Login Functionality - Verify login with invalid credentials
mason_sb_loggedIn_homepage_auth.spec.js
Mason Commerce Tool Site
GPH-Promotional Banner Managment - Verify the promotional banner should be displayed On Homepage
GPH-Stoneberry Logo Redirect - Verify the appearance and accesibility of the Stoneberry logo at the lefthand side
GPH-Sticky Header- Verify the header is sticky through the following pages: PDP
GPH-Mega Menu Navigation - Verify Mega Menu Navigation opens on hovering within the CTA
GPH-Search Bar - Verify the search field appearance, help text display, and functionality
GPH-Account Drawer - Verify generation of the account drawer upon clicking the Account icon
GPH-Account State Update - Verify the header update to display the logged-in user state, display of user's first name under the Account icon
GPH-Sign In/Sign Out - Verify the Test successful sign in/out functionality, display of success messages, redirection behavior upon sign out
GPH-Cart Icon and Drawer - Verify display and functionality of the Cart icon and drawer
mason_sb_myaccount_addresses_standardwithaddresses_auth.spec.js
Mason MyAccount - Addresses - Standard With Addresses
Account - Addresses - Standard With Addresses - Verify functionality of add new Address
Account - Addresses - Remove and Undo Remove Address - Verify clicking on 'Remove' button, the selected address gets deleted and the data removed from the Addresses page.
Account - Addresses - Edit Address - Verify clicking on Edit against any address, application expands edit address form with values pre-populated in it.
Account - Addresses - Edit Address - Verify Address Line 2 (optional) field is collapsed upon load when data is not present.
Account - Addresses - Edit Address - Verify clicking on Save button, application validates (missing required field, invalid field) and shows an error message to user.
Account - Addresses - Add Address - Verify clicking on Save button, application validates (missing required field, invalid field) and shows an error message to user.
Account - Addresses - Cancel Edit Address - Verify Cancel link is shown below the Save button and clicking on it, application collapses the Edit address form.

Account - Addresses - Set as Default Address - Verify if the 'Set as default billing & shipping address' checkbox is selected then newly added address gets updated as the Default Billing & Shipping Address upon save..
mason_sb_myaccount_creditcards_standardwithsavedcards_authuser.spec.js
Mason MyAccount - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards
Account - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards - Verify on adding a new card successfully, application shows the newly added card in the list.

Account - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards - Verify user gets navigate to credit card page by either clicking on the 'Saved Credit Cards' link from the left navigation menu present on the account pages.

Account - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards - Verify Add card form shows following fields associated with credit card:- Card number- Expiry date (mm//yy)- Security code (? icon)- Save as default card checkbox- Save card button.

Account - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards - Verify application always shows default Credit Card as first along with a checkmark encompassed by a green circle and the text “DEFAULT CREDIT CARD”.

Account - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards - Verify clicking on Remove option, application removes the selected card and a success message 'Your credit card was successfully removed' is shown.
Account - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards - Verify 'Undo' option is shown at the end of the success message and clicking on it, application reverses the removal of the credit card.
Account - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards - Verify clicking on Edit button, application expands the edit card form with pre-populated data- Expiry date- Billing address.
Account - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards - Verify user is able to edit the credit card details with new billing address.
Account - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards - Verify user is able to edit the credit card details with any other saved address from the account.
mason_sb_myaccount_longstanding_customer_auth.spec.js
Mason MyAccount Longstanding Customer
Account - My Account-Left-hand Navigation - Verify all navigation links are clickable
Account - My Account-Left-hand Navigation - Verify navigation link highlights current section
Account - My Stoneberry Credit - Verify display of current credit limit and available credit
Account - My Stoneberry Credit - Verify functionality of help icon for Available Credit
Account - Payments - Verify display of total balance, minimum due, and payment due date
Account - Payments - Verify functionality of help icon for Payment Section
Account - Payments - Verify navigation to payment page when click on Make payment button
Account - Orders - Verify display of order data in Orders Page
Account - Orders - Verify clicking on product name or image thumbnail, redirects user to order details page
Account - Address - Verify Default address is shown in the Addresses section along with View Addresses link
Account - My Profile - Verify my profile section shows: - User's First and last name - Email address
Account - Change Password - Verify navigation to Change password page when click on the link from account home page
Account - Saved Credit Cards - Verify Credit card section shows:- Default card details (Credit card svg image, last 4 digits of the card and expiry date)
Account - Orders - Verify clicking on the View Orders link from My Account Dashboard redirect user to the Orders page)
Account - View My Profile - Verify clicking on the View My Profile link from My Account Dashboard redirect user to the My Profile page)
Account - View Addresses - Verify clicking on the View Addresses link from My Account Dashboard redirect user to the Addresses page)
Account - View Saved Credit Card - Verify clicking on the  View Saved Credit Card link from My Account Dashboard redirect user to the Credit Card page)
Account - View Wishlist - Verify clicking on the View Wishlist link from My Account Dashboard redirect user to the Wishlist page)
Account - Wish List - Verify navigation Wish list page when click on wish list link and Wishlist section shows:- Product image thumbnails)
mason_sb_myaccount_mystoneberrycredit_auth.spec.js
Mason MyAccount My Stoneberry Credit
Account - My Stoneberry Credit - Verify redirection upon clicking Start Shopping CTA

Account-My Stoneberry Credit-Overview Section - Verify: If available credit value is greater than or equal to the threshold set for the courtesy nav (currently $75), the available credit should display in green else black
Account-My Stoneberry Credit-Payment Section- Verify display of Make a Payment CTA based on Total Balance
Account-My Stoneberry Credit-Account Information Section - Verify display of Customer Account #, Account Status, Amount Past Due, Last Statement Date, and Next Statement Date
Account-My Stoneberry Credit-Account Information Section- Verify application shows the address in edit mode when click on edit
Account-My Stoneberry Credit-Recent Account Transactions Section - Verify display of transaction date, status, and description
mason_sb_myaccount_orders_standardwithorders_auth.spec.js
Mason MyAccount Orders - Standard With Orders
Account - Orders - Standard With Orders - Verify display and functionality of the dynamic sort option dropdown
Account - Orders - Standard With Orders - Verify display of order details including Order ID, Order Date, and Order Total
Account - Orders Requiring Down Payment - Verify functionality of Make a Down Payment CTA and its redirection to the Make a Down Payment Drawer
mason_sb_newcustomer_myaccount_auth.spec.js
Mason MyAccount New User
New User Account - My Account-Left-hand Navigation - Verify all navigation links are clickable
New User Account - My Account-Left-hand Navigation - Verify navigation link highlights current section
New User Account - My Stoneberry Credit - Verify display of Get Pre Qualified and Learn More links and redirection to the corresponding pages
New User Account - Payments - Verify display of Credit Account Verification when user click on the Make a payment link for new user.
New User Account - Payments - Verify correct display of help icon tooltip.
New User Account - Orders - Verify display of message There are no recent orders in your account.
New User Account - Addresses - Verify display of message There are currently no addresses saved to your account.
New User Account - Saved Credit Cards - Verify display of message There are currently no credit cards saved to your account.
New User Account - Saved Credit Cards - Verify application expands and focuses the user to the Add New Credit/Debit Card fields when navigated to Saved cards page.
New User Account - Wishlist - Verify display of message There are currently no items saved to your wish list.
mason_sb_pdp_auth.spec.js
Mason PDP
PDP - Display of Selected Variant Image - Verify that selected variant’s image is displayed  as full sized to the left
PDP - Image Navigation with Left and Right Arrows - Verify left and right navigation arrows on the main image displayed

PDP - Display of Additional Images as Thumbnails - Verify additional images associated with variants thumbnail images,variant has more than 5 image associated with it, system shall display left and right navigation arrows.
PDP - Highlighting Selected Thumbnail Image - Verify that system can highlight with a black outline the thumbnail image that corresponds to the image currently being viewed as full sized.
PDP - Product Data Display (Name, Item #, Reviews, Shop All Link, Color, Size, Size Chart Link, Pricing) - Verify Display of various product data.
PDP - Product Data Display - Verify selection of size & color variants.
PDP - Display Sale Pricing and Percentage Saved - Verify Sitewide sale pricing shall be displayed bolded in red if the product is on sale followed by the regular retail price.
PDP - Display Dynamic Credit Messaging and Promotional Text - Verify Dynamic Credit Specific Messaging and/or Promotional Text:
PDP - Description,Specifications and Shipping Display - Verify the Display of description,specifications and shipping section:
PDP - Ways to Wear It Section - Verify Ways to wear content:
PDP - Reviews and Questions & Answers Display - Verify Power review and Q&A content:
PDP - Quantity field & Stock Availability: Display - Verify Quantity field & Stock Availability display:
PDP - Quantity update - Verify Quantity update on clicking the plus and minus button:
PDP - Quantity update - Verify Quantity update on entering value in the Quantity textbox:
PDP - Add To Cart - Verify on clicking Add To Cart CTA the product variant will be added to the user’s cart update the numeric qty of items displayed under the cart icon within the Global Header.
mason_signIn.auth.spec.js
Mason SignIn Scenarios
Account - SignIn - Validate the Loader icon when user tries to sign-in
Account - Sign In (Drawer)/Sign In Page - Validate user should be able to login to site
Account - Sign In (Drawer)/Sign In Page - Validate user should be able to login to site and close success message
Account - Sign In (Drawer)/Sign In Page - Validate proper message when login fails
Account - Sign In (Drawer)/Sign In Page - Validate the Error message for null or invalid email
Account - SignIn - Validate the Password Hide/Show in Sign-In
